channel.title: Life on Faveing's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Faveing's Personal Website

item.title: First Post!
item.description:
So I guess I’m starting a blog! Or whatever I want this website so be. Maybe it’ll just be a place to put my thoughts and document my journey in life, i’m not sure!

Introduction

My name is Faveing, I’m a senior Physics major current at CSU Stanislaus with a minor in Computer Science. I’m graduating in May of 2025 and then moving to San Jose to join the Physics Masters program at San Jose State. Aside from my schooling, I am interested in technology, anime, wotagei, astrophotograph.
